ROOT.GetLastUpdateSubStation: select A.id,A.name,A.type,A.dcc_id,A.top_ac_voltage_type,A.pg_id,A.operate_date,a.region,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.altitude,a.owner,0 AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,a.operate_state from ( select distinct logs_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result where tablename == 'SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B' and add_time >= to_date('{0}') ) l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_substation_b A on l.logs_id = A.id where id is not null
ROOT.GetLastUpdatePlantB: select A.id,A.name,A.plant_type,A.dcc_id,A.max_voltage_type,A.connective_pg_id,A.operate_date,a.region,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.altitude,a.owner,0 AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,a.operate_state,a.name_abbreviation from ( select distinct logs_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result where tablename == 'SG_CON_PLANT_B' and add_time >= to_date('{0}') ) l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_plant_b A on l.logs_id = A.id where id is not null
ROOT.GetLastUpdateConverSubStation: select A.id,A.name,A.type,A.dcc_id,A.dc_voltage_type,A.pg_id,A.operate_date,a.region,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.altitude,a.owner,0 AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime,a.operate_state from ( select distinct logs_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result where tablename == 'SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B' and add_time >= to_date('{0}') ) l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B A on l.logs_id = A.id where id is not null
ROOT.GetLastUpdateACLines: select A.id,A.name,A.grid_id,a.voltage_type,a.length,a.start_st_id,a.end_st_id,a.dispatch_org_id,a.operate_date,a.running_state,a.owner,a.start_tower_id,a.end_tower_id,a.license_org_id,0 AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime from ( select distinct logs_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result where tablename == 'SG_DEV_ACLINE_B' and add_time >= to_date('{0}') )l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B A on l.logs_id = A.id where id is not null
ROOT.GetLastUpdateDCLines: select A.id,A.name,A.grid_id,a.voltage_type,a.length,a.start_st_id,a.end_st_id,a.dispatch_org_id,a.operate_date,a.running_state,a.owner,a.start_tower_id,a.end_tower_id,a.license_org_id,0 AS PGLevel,to_date(SUBSTR(A.STAMP,23,19)) as lasttime from ( select distinct logs_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result where tablename == 'SG_DEV_DCLINE_B' and add_time >= to_date('{0}') )l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B A on l.logs_id = A.id where id is not null
ROOT.GetACLineLastTowerUpdateInfos: select t.ID,b.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,t.LONGITUDE,t.LATITUDE,b.TowerName,0 AS VOLTAGE,b.LINE_ID AS LINEID,b.OWNER from( select distinct line_id from ys_db.tb_th_log_result l left join sg_db.sg_dev_acline_r_tower A on l.logs_id=A.tower_id where (l.tablename == 'SG_DEV_TOWER_B' or l.tablename == 'SG_DEV_ACLINE_R_TOWER' ) and l. add_time >= to_date('{0}') and a.line_id is not null )r left join sg_db.sg_dev_acline_r_tower b on r.line_id = b.line_id left join sg_db.sg_dev_tower_b t on b.TOWER_ID = t.ID
ROOT.GetDCLineLastTowerUpdateInfos: select t.ID,b.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,t.LONGITUDE,t.LATITUDE,b.TowerName,0 AS VOLTAGE,b.LINE_ID AS LINEID,b.OWNER from( select distinct line_id from ys_db.tb_th_log_result l left join sg_db.sg_dev_dcline_r_tower A on l.logs_id=A.tower_id where (l.tablename == 'SG_DEV_TOWER_B' or l.tablename == 'SG_DEV_DCLINE_R_TOWER' ) and l. add_time >= to_date('{0}') and a.line_id is not null )r left join sg_db.sg_dev_dcline_r_tower b on r.line_id = b.line_id left join sg_db.sg_dev_tower_b t on b.TOWER_ID = t.ID
ROOT.GetLineIdsByLastTower: select distinct line_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower where tower_id in({0}) union all select distinct line_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower where tower_id in({0})
ROOT.GetLastUpdateTNode: select n.id,n.name,n.line_id,n.owner,n.running_state,n.tower_id,t.longitude,t.latitude,l.voltage_type from ( select distinct logs_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result where tablename == 'SG_DEV_TNODE_B' and add_time >= to_date('{0}') ) th left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tnode_b n on th.logs_id =n.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b l on n.line_id=l.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t on n.tower_id= t.id where n.id is not null
ROOT.GetLastUpdateTLines: select A.* from ( select distinct logs_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result where tablename == 'SG_DEV_TLINE_B' and add_time >= to_date('{0}') )l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TLINE_B A on l.logs_id = A.id where id is not null union select A.* from ( select distinct logs_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result where tablename == 'SG_DEV_TNODE_B' and add_time >= to_date('{0}') )l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TLINE_B A on l.logs_id = A.tnode_id where id is not null
ROOT.GetTLineLastTowerUpdateInfos:
select t.ID,b.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,t.LONGITUDE,t.LATITUDE,b.Tower_Name as TowerName,0 AS VOLTAGE,b.TLINE_ID AS LINEID,b.OWNER from( select distinct tline_id from
same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result l left join sg_db.sg_dev_tline_r_tower A on l.logs_id=A.tower_id where (l.tablename == 'SG_DEV_TOWER_B' or l.tablename == 'SG_DEV_TLINE_R_TOWER' ) and l. add_time >= to_date('{0}') and a.tline_id is not null )r left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tline_r_tower b on r.tline_id = b.tline_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t on b.TOWER_ID = t.ID
ROOT.updateTb_th_log_result: update same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName tb_th_log_result set isupdate = 1 where add_time>=to_date('{0}')
